function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited or prevented access to green spaces harming the well-being of urban residents","Impact":"Negative impact on emotional well-being and mental health","Mitigation":"Improving access to green spaces, creating alternative recreational areas","Technologies":"Smart city planning, urban design solutions","People":"Urban residents, particularly those living in heavily urbanized areas","Owner":"City planners, urban development authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of proof that green belts can prevent urban sprawl","Impact":"Potential ineffective use of green belts as urban development tools","Mitigation":"Researching and implementing alternative urban planning strategies","Technologies":"Urban planning software, geographic information systems (GIS)","People":"Urban planners, city developers","Owner":"Research institutions, urban planning organizations"}]}
